channel.title: Comments on: “All You Need Is A Computer And Internet” – with Sonia Ricotti

item.title: By: Sabrina Truscott
item.dc:creator: Sabrina Truscott
item.description: Awesome, Karin! Congrats on making that mental shift. Side income, main income, I try to share things that will help people be more abundant and happy - no matter how they want to approach it. :) So glad to have you be part of the conversation!
item.content:encoded: Awesome, Karin! Congrats on making that mental shift. Side income, main income, I try to share things that will help people be more abundant and happy – no matter how they want to approach it. ðŸ™‚ So glad to have you be part of the conversation!

item.title: By: Karin
item.dc:creator: Karin
item.description:
Thanks for posting this! It is motivating! I'm trapped in a dead-end job and looking to make a good side income, and I learned entrepreneurship. That is definitely a big change for me, and it was quite a journey out of my comfort zone. I recently launched an e-store on Shopify and also own two blogging sites which I have affiliate links, so I am learning affiliate marketing as well.
There are times I felt like "I've fallen and I can't get up!" but your trainings will help me get back up :)
item.content:encoded:
Thanks for posting this! It is motivating! I’m trapped in a dead-end job and looking to make a good side income, and I learned entrepreneurship. That is definitely a big change for me, and it was quite a journey out of my comfort zone. I recently launched an e-store on Shopify and also own two blogging sites which I have affiliate links, so I am learning affiliate marketing as well.

There are times I felt like “I’ve fallen and I can’t get up!” but your trainings will help me get back up ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Albina
item.dc:creator: Albina
item.description: It is inspiring to listen to Sonia! As she said - learn from the best! Can I become her aprentice? To learn directly from her?
item.content:encoded:
It is inspiring to listen to Sonia!
As she said – learn from the best! Can I become her aprentice? To learn directly from her?

item.title: By: Marge

item.description: Good point. I hadn't thghout about it quite that way. :)
item.content:encoded: Good point. I hadn’t thghout about it quite that way. ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Andrea
item.dc:creator: Andrea
item.description:
This video was great! Sonia Ricotti is super inspiring. Thanks so much for it Sabrina.
I recently did a Digital Marketing course, and my certification is recognized worldwide. For me, it's the perfect time to set up a website and doing Youtube videos because I have the skills and the knowledge required for these two online platforms. But the problem is, about what? I don't have clear ideas about what to talk aboutin my videos and website.
Kind regards,
Andrea
item.content:encoded:
This video was great! Sonia Ricotti is super inspiring. Thanks so much for it Sabrina.

I recently did a Digital Marketing course, and my certification is recognized worldwide. For me, it’s the perfect time to set up a website and doing Youtube videos because I have the skills and the knowledge required for these two online platforms. But the problem is, about what? I don’t have clear ideas about what to talk aboutin my videos and website.

Kind regards,

Andrea

item.title: By: Michael Aquino

item.description: As always!! AWESOME content from one of the greatest in personal development and online marketing.
item.content:encoded: As always!! AWESOME content from one of the greatest in personal development and online marketing.

item.title: By: Sabrina Truscott
item.dc:creator: Sabrina Truscott
item.description: Wonderful, David! We find inspiration so that we can transform ourselves and our own lives. The fortunate ones are those who realize that in the moment and take action.
item.content:encoded: Wonderful, David! We find inspiration so that we can transform ourselves and our own lives. The fortunate ones are those who realize that in the moment and take action.

item.title: By: David Wright
item.dc:creator: David Wright
item.description: Inspired by Sonia when appearing with Natalie Ledwell, I combined her advice with a MindMovie for inspiration!
item.content:encoded: Inspired by Sonia when appearing with Natalie Ledwell, I combined her advice with a MindMovie for inspiration!

item.title: By: Sabrina Truscott
item.dc:creator: Sabrina Truscott
item.description: Wonderful, Alyssa! Providing inspiration like that is EXACTLY why we love doing these interviews! :) And your take-away is right on point. Focus on one step at a time, because any step - regardless of how small - is progress.
item.content:encoded: Wonderful, Alyssa! Providing inspiration like that is EXACTLY why we love doing these interviews! ðŸ™‚ And your take-away is right on point. Focus on one step at a time, because any step – regardless of how small – is progress.
